about_the_game:
I. Game Overview

From the first encounter by the West Lake, to the twists and turns during the Dragon Boat Festival when Bai Suzhen reveals her true form, and then to the heart - pounding adventure of bravely storming Jinshan Temple to save Xu Xian.

II. Detailed Introduction

(1) Immersive Plot Experience

The game deeply restores the story of "The Legend of the White Snake". On the basis of respecting the classic, a great many brand - new details have been added. During the gameplay, players will have in - depth interactions with classic characters such as Xiao Qing and Fa Hai, and feel their complex emotional entanglements and the beliefs they each hold firm. At the same time, the game also incorporates rare and strange beasts and mysterious magic from ancient mythology, allowing players to experience a love story while also getting a taste of a fantastical mythological world full of wonder.

(2) Exquisite Art Style

The game adopts a unique Chinese - style art style, with delicate, beautiful, and brightly - colored graphics. From the beautiful scenery of the West Lake to the solemnity of Jinshan Temple, every scene has been carefully drawn, perfectly restoring the charm of the ancient mythological world. The character image design is also highly distinctive. Bai Suzhen's gentle beauty, Xu Xian's simple kindness, and Xiao Qing's lively and playful nature are all vividly presented through delicate brushstrokes, making players feel as if they are in a magnificent ancient - style scroll.

(3) Dynamic Music and Sound Effects

The game is equipped with a professional music and sound effects system. Corresponding music and sound effects are played according to different plotlines and scenes. When they meet at the West Lake, the melodious ancient - style music adds a lot to the romantic atmosphere. During the tense moments of storming Jinshan Temple, the exciting melody can make players feel the sense of urgency in the battle. In addition, the game also includes rich environmental sound effects, such as the sound of rain, etc., making the players' gaming experience more immersive.

short_description: The Legend of the White Snake is a visual novel game meticulously crafted based on the classic Chinese folktale of the same name. Players will take on the role of Xu Xian and experience the poignant love story that transcends the boundary between humans and demons with Bai Suzhen.
